con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="PO_v1_0_0" targetNamespace="http://www.promostandards.org/WSDL/PO/1.0.0/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://www.promostandards.org/WSDL/PO/1.0.0/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:ns="http://www.promostandards.org/WSDL/PO/1.0.0/SharedObjects/" xmlns:ns1="http://www.codesynthesis.com/xmlns/xsstl" xmlns:ns2="http://www.isotc211.org/iso4217/" xmlns:ns3="http://www.iso20022.org/"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.promostandards.org/WSDL/PO/1.0.0/" schemaLocation="GetSupportedPODataTypesRequest.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.promostandards.org/WSDL/PO/1.0.0/" schemaLocation="GetSupportedPODataTypesResponse.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.promostandards.org/WSDL/PO/1.0.0/" schemaLocation="SendPORequest.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.promostandards.org/WSDL/PO/1.0.0/" schemaLocation="SendPOResponse.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="GetSupportedPODataTypesRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="GetSupportedPODataTypesRequest" element="tns:GetSupportedPODataTypesRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetSupportedPODataTypesResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="GetSupportedPODataTypesResponse" element="tns:GetSupportedPODataTypesResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SendPORequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="SendPORequest" element="tns:SendPORequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SendPOResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="SendPOResponse" element="tns:SendPOResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="POService"> <wsdl:operation name="getSupportedPODataTypes"> <wsdl:input message="tns:GetSupportedPODataTypesRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:GetSupportedPODataTypesResponseMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="sendPO"> <wsdl:input message="tns:SendPORequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:SendPOResponseMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="POServiceBinding" type="tns:POService"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="getSupportedPODataTypes"> <soap:operation soapAction="getSupportedPODataTypes" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="sendPO"> <soap:operation soapAction="sendPO" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="POService"> <wsdl:port name="POServiceBinding" binding="tns:POServiceBinding"> <soap:address location="https://devservices.alphabroder.com/purchaseOrder/service/index.php"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.promostandards.org/WSDL/PO/1.0.0/" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:ns1="http://www.promostandards.org/WSDL/PO/1.0.0/" xmlns:ns2="http://www.promostandards.org/WSDL/PO/1.0.0/" xmlns:ns3="http://www.promostandards.org/WSDL/PO/1.0.0/SharedObjects/"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.promostandards.org/WSDL/PO/1.0.0/SharedObjects/" schemaLocation="SharedObjectsPO.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="GetSupportedPODataTypesRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ns3:wsVersion"/> <xsd:element ref="ns3:id"/> <xsd:element ref="ns3:password" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.promostandards.org/WSDL/PO/1.0.0/SharedObjects/" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:ns1="http://www.promostandards.org/WSDL/PO/1.0.0/" xmlns:ns2="http://www.promostandards.org/WSDL/PO/1.0.0/SharedObjects/" xmlns:ns3="http://www.codesynthesis.com/xmlns/xsstl" xmlns:ns4="http://www.isotc211.org/iso4217/" xmlns:ns5="http://www.iso20022.org/"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.codesynthesis.com/xmlns/xsstl" schemaLocation="iso3166-country-code.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.isotc211.org/iso4217/" schemaLocation="iso4217-currency-code.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.iso20022.org/" schemaLocation="iso20022-uom-code.xsd"/> <!--ENUMERATORS--> <xsd:simpleType name="ChargeTypeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of charge</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Order"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Run"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Setup"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ContactTypeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of contact</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Art"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Bill"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Expeditor"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Order"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Sales"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Sold"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DigitalProofAddressTypeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of digital proof address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Email"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Webservice"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="LineTypeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of order line</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="New"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Reference"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Repeat"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="OrderTypeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of order</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Blank"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Configured"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Sample"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Simple"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="QuantityUomType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of Quantity UOM</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="BX"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CA"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DZ"/> <xsd:enumeration value="EA"/> <xsd:enumeration value="KT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PK"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ST"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TH"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ReferenceNumberTypeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of reference number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="JobOrWorkOrder"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PurchaseOrder"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SalesOrder"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="SeverityType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The severity type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Error"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Information"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Warning"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TaxTypeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of tax</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Hst-Gst"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Pst"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SalesTax"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TransportMechanismType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of transport mechanism</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="ArtworkToFollow"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Email"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Ftp"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Url"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ToleranceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of tolerance allowed</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="AllowOverrun"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AllowUnderrun"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ExactOnly"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ToleranceUomType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of tolerance UOM</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Percent"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Quantity"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--ELEMENTS--> <xsd:element name="accountName"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name of the account that will be invoiced for the purchase order.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="accountNumber"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The number of the account that will be invoiced for the purchase order.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="chargeId" type="xsd:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The charge ID</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="chargeName"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Charge name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:token"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="128"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="chargeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The charge name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ns2:ChargeTypeType"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="colorId"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The color ID</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:token"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="colorName"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The color name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:token"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="comments" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Use comments only when absolutely necessary, as it may cause delays in order processing.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="currency" type="ns4:CurrencyCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The currency the purchase order is transacted in ISO4217 format.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="diameter" nillable="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The diameter</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:fractionDigits value="4"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="description"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The description</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:token"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="decorationId" type="xsd:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Decoration ID</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="decorationName"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The decoration name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="128"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="email"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The email of the contact</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="128"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="extendedPrice" type="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The total price of the line item (unit price * quantity)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="fobId"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Used to indicate the FOB point. Use fobId from the supplier’s Product Pricing and Configuration Service to populate this information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:token"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="geometry"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The decoration geometry</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="height" nillable="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The height</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:fractionDigits value="4"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="id"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The customer Id or any other agreed upon Id.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:token"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="lineItemGroupingId" type="xsd:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier that allows configuration data to be spread out among multiple purchase order lines. Keep lineItemGroupingID unique when referencing the same product on the purchase order. Any change to the product, location, decoration, or artwork should produce a unique lineItemGroupingID to the purchase order.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="locationId" type="xsd:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The supplier's location Id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="locationLinkId" type="xsd:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An array of location link Ids. This links the part to its configured locations.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="locationName"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The location name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="128"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="localizationCountry"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ISO 3166-1 Alpha 2 code for Country</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="2"/> <xsd:minLength value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="localizationLanguage"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ISO 639-1 Alpha 2 code for Language</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="2"/> <xsd:maxLength value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="partId"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The part ID</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:token"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="partGroup"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The part Group</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:token"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="password"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The password associated with the Id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:token"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="productId"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The product ID</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:token"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ratio"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The part ratio</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:fractionDigits value="4"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="shipmentId" type="xsd:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The shipment Id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="uom" type="ns5:ISO20022UomCode"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The UOM</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="unitPrice" type="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unit price</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="width" nillable="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The width</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:fractionDigits value="4"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="wsVersion"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Standard Version of the Web Service being referenced</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:token"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <!--OBJECTS--> <xsd:element name="Artwork"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="refArtworkId" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A pre-shared artwork Id that can be used by the supplier to find and reference the artwork.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="ns2:description" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ns2:Dimensions" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The dimensions of the artwork</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="fileName" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The file name and extension only of the artwork</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="fileLocation" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The exact path/location to the artwork</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="1024"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="transportMechanism" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The mechanism that will be used to transport the artwork; values are enumerated</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ns2:TransportMechanismType"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="instructions" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Any instructions regarding the processing or modification of artwork. Adding instructions will cause delays in processing.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="ns2:Layers" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An object that explains how the artwork layers or stops will be handled</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="ns2:TypesetArray" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An array of typeset data</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Charge"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ns2:chargeId"/> <xsd:element ref="ns2:chargeName" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ns2:description" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ns2:chargeType"/> <xsd:element ref="ns2:Quantity"/> <xsd:element ref="ns2:unitPrice" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ns2:extendedPrice" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Configuration"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An object containing line item configuration data</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="referenceNumber" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The previous order number that this purchase order is referencing</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="referenceNumberType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of the prior order reference; values are enumerated</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="preProductionProof" type="xsd:boolean"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates that this line item is for a pre-production proof</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ChargeArray" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An array of charge information. This array should be populated with information from the supplier’s Promostandards Product Pricing and Configuration service</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ns2:Charge" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="LocationArray"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An array of Decoration Location Information. This array should be populated with information from the supplier’s Promostandards Product Pricing and Configuration service</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ns2:Location" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Contact"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="contactType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of contact.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ns2:ContactTypeType"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="ns2:ContactDetails"/> <xsd:element ref="ns2:accountNumber" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ns2:accountName" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ContactDetails"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="attentionTo" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Attention To (first and last name of contact)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="128"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="addressLines" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="4"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An array of four string of length 64 to hold the address lines.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="city" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The city</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="state" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The state</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="postalCode" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The postal code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="country" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The country</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ns3:ISO3166CountyCode"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="ns2:email" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The email</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="phone" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The phone</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="ns2:comments" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Decoration"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ns2:decorationId"/> <xsd:element ref="ns2:decorationName" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ns2:Artwork"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The object containing the details of the artwork</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DigitalProof"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="required" type="xsd:boolean"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A Boolean value set to TRUE indicates a proof is required for this purchase order; the value is FALSE otherwise.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DigitalProofAddressArray"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ns2:DigitalProofAddress" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DigitalProofAddress"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of address of the
